legal_basis: s. 6(1) of the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
cause_of_action: Dispute over sufficiency of notices of allegation filed by generic drug manufacturers under the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
procedure_followed: Judicial review applications brought by patent holders challenging the adequacy of allegations of non-infringement made by generic companies
decision_reasoning: factual assertions must justify non-infringement claims
result_of_case: Court determined that factual assertions must justify non-infringement claims; procedural issues were addressed but did not alter outcomes
